170744.content: Kako ste napravili spremanje id proizvoda u local storage, tj kako ste znali koji je id proizvoda kod klika na gumb

170788.content:
@tetak#170744

Ja sam ID proizvoda pomoću [dataseta](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLOrForeignElement/dataset) spremio u [data atribut](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/HTML/Howto/Use_data_attributes) _add to cart_ gumba.

Pri kliku na gumb sam ga onda dohvaćao iz [event targeta](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Event/target).

Evo mog koda:

[Postavljanje ID-ja](https://github.com/studosi-fer/RPPZWIPU/blob/997f990eb0a91de014841249d79f0083800cba14/labosi/lab-2/2019-20/by___builtin_popcount/order.html#L144), [dohvaćanje ID-ja](https://github.com/studosi-fer/RPPZWIPU/blob/997f990eb0a91de014841249d79f0083800cba14/labosi/lab-2/2019-20/by___builtin_popcount/order.html#L80)

(Rad s local storageom mi je [u drugoj datoteci](https://github.com/studosi-fer/RPPZWIPU/blob/997f990eb0a91de014841249d79f0083800cba14/labosi/lab-2/2019-20/by___builtin_popcount/scripts/main.js).)
